title: The Last Drive - Blood Nirvana (1990)@flac
description:
The Last Drive is a Greek punk garage rock group which formed in 1983, broke up in 1995, and reunited in January 2007.
Their LP Blood Nirvana, released in 1990, marked the change in their sound becoming harder and speedier and moving towards stoner rock and neo-psychedelia, without however burning the bridges with its garage past, a fact that let down some of their hardcore garage fans and ended their cooperation with Music Maniac. 
At this time they were considered a part of the "explosion" of the hard rock/indie Greek scene that took part during the early 90's. 
Thus, they started becoming more popular among rock fans in Greece, and on the same year they were voted "band of the year" by the readers of the leading music magazine, Pop & Rock. They played as a support act for the Wipers, The Jesus and Mary Chain, The Gun Club, and toured Germany with Dead Moon. (wikipedia)

 
http://i.imgur.com/5OUL0AZ.jpg
